index.title: Minigames!
description: That's right, minigames! written in your favorite game engine, discord! okay, maybe not, but they're still cool
Currenttly, available minigames are 2048 and tictactoe, but more will come out soon! you can check more info about one with `%help minigame <name>`
2+2 = 4, 4+4 = 8 and so on, merge the tiles and try to reach 2048 (or more!), pretty simple

tictactoe.title: Tic-Tac-Toe!
description: Yep, tictactoe, with multiplayer, just ping someone within your message and play! you choose the tiles by typing in their number, top to down, left to right
